name: Weird Square
description:
You are square and need to get to the end of level, but if you aren't experienced, it can be hard.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Contains:

- Custom environments

- Custom modifiers

- 3 levels

- 1 Secret level

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This game also has it's own launcher with Discord: discord.gg/kCVMHDawaj

Please, keep in mind, that this game is currently in Beta, so it's textures are not final, even the gameplay can change,  stay tuned to know what's new in updates (by Itch devlogs, or by update log in-game)

Updates are released every 1 - 2 weeks

Progress is not saving!

Game is did only by me, so any donations are welcome(they really help on doing new updates and hiring designers :))
